price: Wancan ne. Kuma wanda ya girmama ibãdõdin Allah, to, lalle ne ita (girmamãwar) tanã daga ayyukan zukãta na ibãda.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَن يُعَظِّمۡ شَعَٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقۡوَى ٱلۡقُلُوبِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika waman yuʿaẓẓim shaʿāira al-lahi fa-innahā min taqwā al-qulūbi
